sysevent_in_email_action.description: By clicking the link created by the MailTo Email Template, a reply is automaticly sent with the request to close the needit task as subject. The Inbound Action notices the reply by checking the replies subject which has been created by thetemplate. In the following, the tasks state fields value is changed to "Closed Complete".
sysevent_in_email_action.name: Close NeedIt Task
